basic.description: Introduction to communication networks design principles, data encoding, media access sublayer, local area networks, protocol analysis, mobile communication networks and network security.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Computer Networks II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of (ELEC326 or STAT351) and (ELEC471 or CISC435) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program or an SODE-P-BCH Academic Plan.
